San Luis Rey River Trail.knownFor: “ Good bike path ” Reviewed December 17, 2015 Follows about 8 miles of the San Lois Rey arroyo along the south levy top so it's mostly flat. Good quality asphalt for most of the miles, with some washboard concrete at the underpasses. This path isolates you from traffic, but there are quite a few access points, most with parking, some not.
